Wisdom: أَحَبُّ الْعِبَادِ إِلَى اللَّهِ تَعَالَى الْمُتَأَسِّي بِنَبِيِّهِ ص وَالْمُقْتَصُّ أَثَرَهُ
enWisdom: The most beloved of servants to Allah is the most obedient of them to Him

Wisdom: أَشْبَهُ النَّاسِ بِأَنْبِيَاءَ اللَّهِ أَقْوَلُهُمْ لِلْحَقِّ وَأَصْبَرُهُمْ عَلَى الْعَمَلِ بِهِ
enWisdom: The people who most resemble the Prophets of Allah are those who speak the truth the most and are most patient in acting upon it

Wisdom: ارْضَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ ص رَائِداً وَإِلَى النَّجَاةِ قَائِداً
enWisdom: Be pleased with Muhammad (s) as your guide [and role model] and as the one who will lead you to salvation

Wisdom: اسْتَجِيبُوا لِأَنْبِيَاءِ اللَّهِ وَسَلِّمُوا لِأَمْرِهِمْ وَاعْمَلُوا بِطَاعَتِهِمْ تَدْخُلُوا فِي شَفَاعَتِهِمْ
enWisdom: Respond to the calls of the Prophets of Allah and submit yourselves to their commands and be obedient to them, [as a result] you will be included in their intercession

Wisdom: اقْتَدُوا بِهُدَى نَبِيِّكُمْ فَإِنَّهُ أَصْدَقُ الْهُدَى وَاسْتَنُّوا بِسُنَّتِهِ فَإِنَّهَا أَهْدَى السُّنَنِ
enWisdom: Follow the guidance of your Prophet for it is the truest guidance, and emulate his practices for they are the most exemplary practices

Wisdom: أَوْلَى النَّاسِ بِالْأَنْبِيَاءِ أَعْلَمُهُمْ بِمَا جَاءُوا بِهِ [بِمَا أَمَرُوا بِهِ‏]
enWisdom: The nearest of people to us is one who loyally supports us and has enmity for our enemies

Wisdom: أَقْرَبُ النَّاسِ مِنَ الْأَنْبِيَاءِ أَعْمَلُهُمْ بِمَا أَمَرُوا بِهِ
enWisdom: The closest people to the Prophets are those who act upon their commandments [and teachings] the most

Wisdom: إِنَّ عَدُوَّ مُحَمَّدٍ ص مَنْ عَصَى اللَّهَ وَإِنْ قَرُبَتْ قَرَابَتُهُ
enWisdom: Indeed one who disobeys Allah is the enemy of Muhammad (s), even if he is the nearest of his relatives

Wisdom: إِنَّ وَلِيَّ مُحَمَّدٍ ص مَنْ أَطَاعَ اللَّهَ وَإِنْ بَعُدَتْ لُحْمَتُهُ
enWisdom: Verily the true friend of Muhammad, peace be upon him and his progeny, is one who obeys Allah even if his close relatives distance themselves from him [because of it]

Wisdom: إِنَّ أَوْلَى النَّاسِ بِالْأَنْبِيَاءِ ع أَعْلَمُهُمْ [أَعْمَلُهُمْ‏] بِمَا جَاءُوا بِهِ
enWisdom: The people who are most deserving of the [guidance of the] Prophets are those who have the most knowledge about what they came with

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ عَمِلَ بِسُنَّةِ الدِّينِ وَاقْتَفَى آثَارَ النَّبِيِّينَ
enWisdom: Blessed is he who acts upon the teachings of religion and follows the footsteps of the Prophets

Wisdom: مَا أَعْظَمَ فَوْزَ مَنِ اقْتَفَى أَثَرَ النَّبِيِّينَ
enWisdom: How great is the success of the one who follows in the footsteps of the Prophets!

Wisdom: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّهُ لَمْ يَكُنْ لِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ حُجَّةٌ فِي أَرْضِهِ أَوْكَدُ مِنْ نَبِيِّنَا مُحَمَّدٍ ص وَلَا حِكْمَةٌ أَبْلَغُ مِنْ كِتَابِهِ الْقُرْآنِ الْعَظِيمِ وَلَا مَدَحَ اللَّهُ تَعَالَى مِنْكُمْ إِلَّا مَنِ اعْتَصَمَ بِحَبْلِهِ وَاقْتَدَى بِنَبِيِّهِ وَإِنَّمَا هَلَكَ مَنْ هَلَكَ عِنْدَ مَا عَصَاهُ وَخَالَفَهُ وَاتَّبَعَ هَوَاهُ فَلِذَلِكَ يَقُولُ عَزَّ مِنْ قَائِلٍ فَلْيَحْذَرِ الَّذِينَ يُخالِفُونَ عَنْ أَمْرِهِ أَنْ تُصِيبَهُمْ فِتْنَةٌ أَوْ يُصِيبَهُمْ عَذابٌ أَلِيمٌ
enWisdom: People! There is no proof of Allah, the Glorified, on His earth greater than our Prophet, Muhammad (s), nor is there any wisdom more manifest than His book, the Glorious Qur’an and Allah, the Exalted, has not praised anyone from among you except he who holds fast to his rope and follows His prophet; and only he perishes, who perishes when he disobeys Him, goes against His commands and follows his vain desiresThis is why the Almighty says ‘… let those who disobey His order beware lest an ordeal should afflict them or a painful chastisement befall them’
